amendment.description: Amendment strikes the findings section of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-416 to strike the findings in Title I.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 173, 2 Present (Roll no. 122).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Woodall.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 173, 2 Present (Roll no. 122).
